Newspaper headlinesA newspaper headline is a very short summary of a news report. It normally appears in large letters above the report. …
to have something as a headline or as the main story: The story was headlined "Killer dogs on the loose".
to be the main performer at an entertainment event: The band's headlining appearance at the festival could be their last.
